Skill_1.skillDescrip: Dash 4 meters forward and slash at foes with your dual blades to inflict 591 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Move Distance +3.0 meter(s).

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Before charging, create a sword burst that lasts for 1s. knocking foes backward and inflicting up to +145.0% Damage. This effect's cooldown time is +5s.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Jump 6 meters forward, pushing foes back for 978.9 Damage. Deliver a powerful slash with your longsword upon landing to inflict 652 Damage and knock the foes away. Pushed foes are launched back in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants Push Immunity during the aerial attack.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Move Distance +4 meters. Removes the last longsword attack. Enables a higher jump able to go over Guardian foes. Sets Corkscrew's additional move distance to 2 meters.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Swing your longsword 2 times as you move 5 meters forward, inflicting 872 and 715 Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Move Distance per spin +2.0 meter(s). Use with Concentrated Attack to advance 4.0 meter(s) before attacking.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants Push Immunity.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Changes to a triple spin attack. Damage +105.0%.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Deliver a swift slash with your dual blades to inflict 369 Damage, then slash upward to create a deadly tornado that inflicts 556 Damage and launches foes in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Adds a third attack. Deliver a rising slash with a longsword and create a bigger twister, knocking foes into the air. Damage +80.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: During skill use, grants Push Immunity. Cooldown +8.0s.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Attack foes with the hilt of your longsword to push them back for 576 Damage, then move 4 meters forward as you strike them on the head, inflicting 576 Damage and stunning them for 1s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Deletes the hilt attack. Enables you to attack more quickly in place.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Stun duration +1.5s.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Charge and release the skill key midway to perform an upper slash with your longsword to inflict 1769 Damage, launching foes into the air. Overcharge to push foes back as you advance 5 meters forward, inflicting up to 3,561.3 Damage and launching foes higher in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Outgoing Damage +60.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: The Overcharged attack causes a time-delayed Dark explosion after a while, launching its targets again in the air with 105.0% basic skill Damage.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Spin toward the target location and move 5 meters, inflicting up to 434.2 Damage. This skill can be used up to 2 times in a row.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Perform a sweeping slash in front of you to inflict up to 3,646.8 Damage, pulling foes close.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Changes to Holding mode. Doubles the attack duration. Total outgoing Damage +80.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Move faster to attack more. Outgoing Damage +105.0%.

Skill_9.skillDescrip: Dash 12 meters toward the target location, slashing through foes with all your swords. Foes caught in the path receive 1900 Damage at the moment of impact, then get launched in the air moments later for 6,452.6 Damage. This skill allows you to pierce through Guardians as well.

Skill_1.skillDescrip: Dash 4 meters forward and slash at foes with your dual blades to inflict 591 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Move Distance +3.0 meter(s).

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Before charging, create a sword burst that lasts for 1s. knocking foes backward and inflicting up to +145.0% Damage. This effect's cooldown time is +5s.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Jump 6 meters forward, pushing foes back for 978.9 Damage. Deliver a powerful slash with your longsword upon landing to inflict 652 Damage and knock the foes away. Pushed foes are launched back in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants Push Immunity during the aerial attack.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Move Distance +4 meters. Removes the last longsword attack. Enables a higher jump able to go over Guardian foes. Sets Corkscrew's additional move distance to 2 meters.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Create a tornado that protects you and inflict 228 Damage. The tornado lasts 6s, inflicting 156 Damage to nearby foes.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: During the Maelstrom buff, Death Orb Meter gains +30.0% when hitting with Normal and Awakening skills.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Upon use, Move Speed +19.8% for all party members within 24 meters for 6.1s . Adds the Dark Order buff of Atk. Speed +25%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Grants Paralysis Immunity during the Maelstrom buff. Cooldown +5.0s.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Deliver a swift slash with your dual blades to inflict 369 Damage, then slash upward to create a deadly tornado that inflicts 556 Damage and launches foes in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Adds a third attack. Deliver a rising slash with a longsword and create a bigger twister, knocking foes into the air. Damage +80.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: During skill use, grants Push Immunity. Cooldown +8.0s.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Attack foes with the hilt of your longsword to push them back for 576 Damage, then move 4 meters forward as you strike them on the head, inflicting 576 Damage and stunning them for 1s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Deletes the hilt attack. Enables you to attack more quickly in place.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Stun duration +1.5s.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Charge and release the skill key midway to perform an upper slash with your longsword to inflict 1769 Damage, launching foes into the air. Overcharge to push foes back as you advance 5 meters forward, inflicting up to 3,561.3 Damage and launching foes higher in the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Outgoing Damage +60.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: The Overcharged attack causes a time-delayed Dark explosion after a while, launching its targets again in the air with 105.0% basic skill Damage.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Spin toward the target location and move 5 meters, inflicting up to 434.2 Damage. This skill can be used up to 2 times in a row.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Perform a sweeping slash in front of you to inflict up to 3,646.8 Damage, pulling foes close.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Changes to Holding mode. Doubles the attack duration. Total outgoing Damage +80.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Move faster to attack more. Outgoing Damage +105.0%.

Skill_9.skillDescrip: Dash 12 meters toward the target location, slashing through foes with all your swords. Foes caught in the path receive 1900 Damage at the moment of impact, then get launched in the air moments later for 6,452.6 Damage. This skill allows you to pierce through Guardians as well.

Skill_1.skillName: No build submitted, please select another

Skill_1.skillDescrip: Use your spear as a lever to advance 7 meters forward, inflicting 241 Damage 3 times, followed by a strong kick that inflicts 388 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, Stuns foe for 1.5s. Cooldown +4s.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Drag your spear across the ground while moving forward, inflicting 456 Damage 2 times, followed by a diagonal upward slash that inflicts 781 and 906 Damage. Hit foes are launched in the air.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Create wind pressure with an upward attack. AoE Radius +20.0%.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Consumes 20% of the Dual Meter. Damage +60.0%. This effect does not apply if the Dual Meter is charged less than 20%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Creates a whirlwind with an upward strike, inflicting Damage equal to 50.0% of Base Damage. With Stretch, the whirlwind grows. With Double Upper Slash, the whirlwind flies forward.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Jump up and thrust your spear 5 meters forward and inflict 361 Damage to nearby foes before performing a rotating kick attack that inflicts 361 Damage 1 time and 241 Damage 4 times. Use the skill again to land at the target location, swing your spear, and inflict 726.9 Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Move Speed of downward strike attacks +2.0 meter(s).

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: AoE Radius +20.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Cooldown -3.0s. Movements become simplified. Removes the spinning kick after striking with the spear to immediately use the spear to support your body.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Stick your spear in the ground and do a somersault, inflicting 1096 Damage and launching foes into the air.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Increases the distance that foes are lifted. Increases knockdown time.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Tear at the floor while performing an upward strike. AoE Radius +20%. Damage +50.0%.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Enlarge your spear and spin 360 degrees to inflict 3433 Damage, knocking foes back.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Swing your spear diagonally. AoE Radius -20%. Attack time -0.6s. Immediately swing your spear at the foe. Damage +20.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Swing your spear to create a dragon along the trajectory that attacks 3 times. Damage +50.0%. Crit Rate +25.0%.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Move 8 meters forward past foes to inflict 550 Damage 3 times and return to your position, inflicting 709 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: AoE Radius -20%. Immediately performs1 quick frontal attack before returning.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Strike upward with your spear to inflict 255 Damage and launch foes into the air then slash with your spear while advancing 3 meters forward, inflicting 205 Damage. Afterwards, slash 2 times in the opposite direction, inflicting 255 and 308 Damage. Airborne foes are launched in the air again when hit.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Immediately advance 6 meters forward and perform 1 slash attack. Grants Immunity to Paralysis while moving and inflicts the same total Damage to foes.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Spin sideways, inflicting 416 Damage 3 times, followed by a finishing blow that inflicts 539 Damage. Airborne foes hit by the spinning attack are launched in the air again, and then get slammed to the ground with the last blow.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Slam down the foe with the last attack even if the target is not airborne.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On skill use, grants Push Immunity.

Skill_1.skillDescrip: Charge forward 6 meters and stab foes with your sword to inflict 1058 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: When charging, create a shield for 12.5% of Max HP for 3.0s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: The charging stab attack changes into an rising slash. Inflicts +80.0% Damage. Knocks foes into the air.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Summon the Solar Guardian and inflict 2062 Damage to nearby foes. The guardian blesses all party members within a 24 meter radius. Damage received -20% for 8s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants +15.0% of your Atk. Power for all party members within 24 meters for 8.0s. Overall Atk. Power +6%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: AoE Radius +20% . Damage +388.0%.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Summon a magick circle of light through holy scriptures. Texts made of infinite light swirl within the magic circle, inflicting 2,116.6 total Damage to foes for 2s.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 15.0% of Max HP for 5.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Holy]. On hit, leaves Light's Vestige on foes. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: If attack is maintained to the end, summons a Light's Guardian that swings its sword and inflicts +205.5% Damage and knocks back foes.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Slowly move forward and slash your foe 7 times, inflicting 193, 209, 209, 209, 209, 209, and 241 Damage with each slash.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, cooldown is -1.8s per foe up to -9.0s.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Hold the sword with one hand and quickly spin in position to inflict 1,681.2 Damage to your foe, then perform a crushing blow that inflicts 721 Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 12.5% of Max HP for 4.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Damage +144.0%. Damage +229.4% while in Sacred Executioner status.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Slight increase in spin duration. Spin Attack max Damage +25%. On last attack, stabs ground with a sword and summons 3 Light's Lightning that spread out. Last attack Damage +329.0%.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Gather divine strength for 2s before having it explode at the target location, inflicting 3843 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, inflict Light's Vestige on the foe. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12.0s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Lightning]. After Holy Explosion, inflicts up to 170.4% Damage over time for 5s at the location of the explosion.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Generate a holy area at the target location for 6s and inflict 811.9 total Damage over time.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: During skill use, grants Paralysis immunity.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, Damage to Minor and Normal foes +145.0%.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Drop a sword made of light at the target location to inflict 1334 Damage to your foe and thrust the sword into the ground.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Changes to Casting mode. Inflicts +70.0% Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: The sword explodes after falling, inflicting +70.0% Damage.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Drops a huge sword. AoE Radius +20%. Inflicts +80.0% Damage.

Skill_1.skillDescrip: Throw a dagger at the target location to inflict 1444 Damage. Use the skill again and teleport behind the hit target if there is no obstacle between you and the foe. Move Speed +10% for 2s after teleportation.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Dagger attack now has 'Bleeding Poison.' Bleeding Poison inflicts 4.1 bleed Damage every 1s for 8.0s. Stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, inflicts Excessive Bleeding on target, inflicting 85.4 Damage every 1s for 8.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Throwing daggers Stun foes for 1.5s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: While moving, strike down in a 3 meter radius area. Inflicts 60.0% of Base Damage.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Move 2 meters forward and thrust your weapon to inflict 609 Damage, then summon shadows to viciously cut and slice foes for 1,226.7 Damage over 10 hits. Use Flurry to the end to move 6 meters forward and inflict 1222 Damage. Cancel Flurry midway to inflict 919 Damage. Airborne foes are launched back into the air when hit.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Ignores 62.0% of foe's Defense.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Last attack's outgoing Damage +150.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Changes to Normal mode. Now a stabbing attack that pierces 8 meters forward. Creates a circular shadow area on the covered ground for the shadow to attack 5 times and explode. Outgoing Damage +70.0%.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Vanish in the air and move up to 8 meters toward the target location before striking down, inflicting 2491 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Outgoing Damage +60.0%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Jump higher and slam down harder to inflict 180.0% of Base Damage.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Madly hack at foes in front of you, attacking them 4 times for 399, 399, 399, and 399 [Dark] Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Last attack now has 'Bleeding Poison.' Bleeding Poison inflicts 4.1 bleed Damage every 1s for 8.0s. Can stack up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, inflicts Excessive Bleeding on target, inflicting 85.4 Damage every 1s for 8.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: During skill use, gain Push Immunity.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Attack changes to do 2 hits and do 160.0% of Base Damage. Both hits stack poison and the last attack knocks down foes.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Summon a shadow clone at the target location that lasts for 6s. Use the skill again to throw a shuriken with your clone at the target location, inflicting 765 [Dark] damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: On hit, Persona Meter and Chaos Meter gain +45.0%.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: No longer throw a Shuriken. Change to slashing attacks while in motion. Inflicts 190.0% of Base Damage and knocks down foes.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Jump 3 meters backward and gather dark energy to shoot yourself forward, slashing foes for knocking 2658 Damage and then down as you pierce through them.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Instantly attack without jumping backwards.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Descend with more power. Outgoing Damage +95.0%.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Call for the darkness of a twisted space to quickly move 10 meters forward, inflicting 639.8 Damage to foes caught in the path. Inflict an additional 629 Damage to foes in your path upon landing. This skill allows you to pierce through Guardians.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On skill use, Move Speed +30.0% for 3.1s.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Summon a shadow trap at your current position, then move 6 meters backward, detonating a shadow that inflicts 701 Damage to foes within a 3 meter radius, stunning them for 2s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Summon additional Shadow Clones to attract foes within a 4 meter radius. Clones explode for 45.0% Damage.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: On skill use, Shadow Skills cooldown -2.4s.

Skill_1.skillName: No build submitted, please select another
No build submitted, please select another

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Summon a shadow clone at the target location that lasts for 6s. Use the skill again to throw a shuriken with your clone at the target location, inflicting 872 [Dark] damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: No longer throw a Shuriken. Change to slashing attacks while in motion. Inflicts 190.0% of Base Damage and knocks down foes.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: On hit, Damage up to +144% based on distance to the target. With Forward Slash, Damage +135%.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Jump 3 meters backward and gather dark energy to shoot yourself forward, slashing foes for knocking 2658 Damage and then down as you pierce through them.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Instantly attack without jumping backwards.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Dark]. Descend with more power. Outgoing Damage +95.0%.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Call for the darkness of a twisted space to quickly move 10 meters forward, inflicting 491.6 Damage to foes caught in the path. Inflict an additional 484 Damage to foes in your path upon landing. This skill allows you to pierce through Guardians.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Summon a shadow trap at your current position, then move 6 meters backward, detonating a shadow that inflicts 701 Damage to foes within a 3 meter radius, stunning them for 2s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Move Distance +4.0 meter(s).

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: On skill use, Shadow Skills cooldown -2.4s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants +15.0% of your Atk. Power for all party members within 24 meters for 8.0s. Overall Atk. Power +6%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: AoE Radius +20% . Damage +388.0%.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Summon a magick circle of light through holy scriptures. Texts made of infinite light swirl within the magic circle, inflicting 2,116.6 total Damage to foes for 2s.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 15.0% of Max HP for 5.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Holy]. On hit, leaves Light's Vestige on foes. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: If attack is maintained to the end, summons a Light's Guardian that swings its sword and inflicts +205.5% Damage and knocks back foes.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Slowly move forward and slash your foe 7 times, inflicting 193, 209, 209, 209, 209, 209, and 241 Damage with each slash.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, cooldown is -1.8s per foe up to -9.0s.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Hold the sword with one hand and quickly spin in position to inflict 1,681.2 Damage to your foe, then perform a crushing blow that inflicts 721 Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 12.5% of Max HP for 4.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Damage +144.0%. Damage +229.4% while in Sacred Executioner status.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Slight increase in spin duration. Spin Attack max Damage +25%. On last attack, stabs ground with a sword and summons 3 Light's Lightning that spread out. Last attack Damage +329.0%.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Gather divine strength for 2s before having it explode at the target location, inflicting 3843 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, inflict Light's Vestige on the foe. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12.0s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Lightning]. After Holy Explosion, inflicts up to 170.4% Damage over time for 5s at the location of the explosion.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Generate a holy area at the target location for 6s and inflict 811.9 total Damage over time.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: During skill use, grants Paralysis immunity.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, Damage to Minor and Normal foes +145.0%.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Drop a sword made of light at the target location to inflict 1334 Damage to your foe and thrust the sword into the ground.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Changes to Casting mode. Inflicts +70.0% Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: The sword explodes after falling, inflicting +70.0% Damage.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Drops a huge sword. AoE Radius +20%. Inflicts +80.0% Damage.

Skill_5.skillDescrip: Hold the sword with one hand and quickly spin in position to inflict 1,681.2 Damage to your foe, then perform a crushing blow that inflicts 721 Damage.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 12.5% of Max HP for 4.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Damage +144.0%. Damage +229.4% while in Sacred Executioner status.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Slight increase in spin duration. Spin Attack max Damage +25%. On last attack, stabs ground with a sword and summons 3 Light's Lightning that spread out. Last attack Damage +329.0%.

Skill_6.skillDescrip: Gather divine strength for 2s before having it explode at the target location, inflicting 3843 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, inflict Light's Vestige on the foe. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12.0s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Lightning]. After Holy Explosion, inflicts up to 170.4% Damage over time for 5s at the location of the explosion.

Skill_7.skillDescrip: Generate a holy area at the target location for 6s and inflict 811.9 total Damage over time.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: During skill use, grants Paralysis immunity.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: On hit, Damage to Minor and Normal foes +145.0%.

Skill_8.skillDescrip: Drop a sword made of light at the target location to inflict 1334 Damage to your foe and thrust the sword into the ground.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Changes to Casting mode. Inflicts +70.0% Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: The sword explodes after falling, inflicting +70.0% Damage.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: Drops a huge sword. AoE Radius +20%. Inflicts +80.0% Damage.

Skill_1.skillDescrip: Charge forward 6 meters and stab foes with your sword to inflict 1058 Damage.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: When charging, create a shield for 12.5% of Max HP for 3.0s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: The charging stab attack changes into an rising slash. Inflicts +80.0% Damage. Knocks foes into the air.

Skill_2.skillDescrip: Summon the Solar Guardian and inflict 2062 Damage to nearby foes. The guardian blesses all party members within a 24 meter radius. Damage received -20% for 8s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Grants +15.0% of your Atk. Power for all party members within 24 meters for 8.0s. Overall Atk. Power +6%.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: AoE Radius +20% . Damage +388.0%.

Skill_3.skillDescrip: Summon a magick circle of light through holy scriptures. Texts made of infinite light swirl within the magic circle, inflicting 2,116.6 total Damage to foes for 2s.

Tripod1.tripodDescrip: Creates a shield for 15.0% of Max HP for 5.0s.

Tripod2.tripodDescrip: Element is now [Holy]. On hit, leaves Light's Vestige on foes. Damage from all Party Members +10.0% for 12s.

Tripod3.tripodDescrip: If attack is maintained to the end, summons a Light's Guardian that swings its sword and inflicts +205.5% Damage and knocks back foes.

Skill_4.skillDescrip: Slowly move forward and slash your foe 7 times, inflicting 193, 209, 209, 209, 209, 209, and 241 Damage with each slash.
